means: 祀为神，奉若神明，被奉为神者

sentence.Network_en: For the same reason , our party abhors the deification of an individual.
sentence.Network_cn: 因为这样, 我们党也厌弃对于个人的神化.

sentence.Network_en: You created a deification and a miracle.
sentence.Network_cn: 你创造了一个神化,创造了一个奇迹.

sentence.Network_en: Exaltation to divine rank or stature; deification.
sentence.Network_cn: 奉为神明; 神化的过程.

You created a deification and a miracle ., 你创造了一个神化 , 创造了一个奇迹.

entry.def: If you talk about the deification of someone or something, you mean that they are regarded with very great respect and are not criticized at all.

example.tran: 20 世纪 40 年代对科学的神化

means.word_mean: 1. the condition of being treated like a god
2. an embodiment of the qualities of a god;
3. the elevation of a person (as to the status of a god)

auth_sentence.content: The virtual deification of Mao has made China very nearly a personal theocracy.
auth_sentence.res_content: The virtual deification of Mao has made China very nearly a personal theocracy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The virtual deification of Mao has made China very nearly a personal theocracy.

auth_sentence.content: While the tendency to objectify' can be called as Reification, the second quality can be termed as Deification.
auth_sentence.res_content: While the tendency to objectify' can be called as Reification, the second quality can be termed as Deification.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: While the tendency to objectify' can be called as Reification, the second quality can be termed as Deification.

auth_sentence.content: This lack of historical success flies in the face of the widespread deification of guerrillas such as Guevara.
auth_sentence.res_content: This lack of historical success flies in the face of the widespread deification of guerrillas such as Guevara.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This lack of historical success flies in the face of the widespread deification of guerrillas such as Guevara.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,由ific变化而来,"产生,……化",通常在fy,ty结尾的动词后

stems_affixes.word_buile: ampl=ample充足的,详细的+ification产生,……化→放大后看得更加详细
glorify使更壮丽,赞扬+ification产生,……化→n.赞颂;美化
magn大+ification产生,……化→n.扩大,放大倍率
verify证实,查证的名词→n.确认,查证,作证
